content.rendered: TPF is a factor of total protection from UV rays, calculated considering the internal and external lens’s  protection. The value indicates how many times a lens with TOTAL CARE coating protects against a standard lens.

excerpt.rendered: Recent studies have shown that up to 50% of the damage caused by the extended exposure to UV rays are given by the reflection of the back and side part of the lens. Total Care is the coating designed to protect the eye from UV rays coming from every direction.
